author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...AIR FORCE RECONNAISSANCE CURRENTLY INVESTIGATING LORENA... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING SPREADING NORTHWARD ACROSS BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR...
summary: ...AIR FORCE RECONNAISSANCE CURRENTLY INVESTIGATING LORENA... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING SPREADING NORTHWARD ACROSS BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... As of 11:00 AM MST Wed Sep 03 the center of Lorena was located near 22.5, -112.1 with movement NW at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 985 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...AIR FORCE RECONNAISSANCE CURRENTLY INVESTIGATING LORENA... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING SPREADING NORTHWARD ACROSS BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... As of 11:00 AM MST Wed Sep 03 the center of Lorena was located near 22.5, -112.1 with movement NW at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 985 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Lorena (EP2/EP122025)
